issue.body: Puzzle `416-0f169fbf` in `src/test/java/com/jcabi/github/mock/MkPullComment.java:43-45` has to be resolved: Mock for pull comment. Let's implements Mock for PullComment using using MkStorage. Don't forget about @EqualsAndHashCode and include unit tests.
